name: kota-db
description: KotaDB indexing and API service built with Bun + TypeScript.

scripts.test:validate-migrations: diff -r src/db/migrations supabase/migrations || echo 'WARNING: Migration directories are out of sync!'
scripts.test:validate-env: ! grep -rn 'process\.env\.\(SUPABASE_URL\|DATABASE_URL\)\s*=\s*["\x27]' tests/ || (echo 'ERROR: Found hardcoded environment variable string assignments in tests/' && exit 1)
